name: OnActorStreamOut
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when an actor is streamed out by a player's client.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor that has been streamed out for the player.

params_body.name: forplayerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that streamed the actor out.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_cb:
OnActorStreamIn: Called when an actor is streamed in by a player.
 OnPlayerStreamOut: Called when a player streams out for another player.
